title: Study Spot
description: Track how long you've been working in the library, then compete and show off your progress with an NFT! Won 'Most Creative Use of Verbwire API' at DeltaHacks IX. Developed using Next.js, TypeScript, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Chess Bot
description: Compete against an AI chess opponent, which I made for my ISC4U final project. It was made in Unity using C#.

title: mflix
description: A place to search and discover movies. This database contains over 20,000 movies, with data such as actors, ratings, release date, etc. It was developed using Next.js, MongoDB Atlas, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Backend Bruno
description: A zombie-survival/shooter game with an emphasis on verticality! Developed in Unity 3D and C# by Mash Backslash Studios.

title: Markdown Blog
description: Create styled blog posts using markdown. Developed using Express.js, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB, and EJS.

title: Emergency!
description: Tackle emergency situations with step-by-step instructions using Emergency! Developed for the MERGE 2021 Hack + Policython in the healthcare track.

title: Verifme
description: A Reddit-like platform for remote students. Canadian high school students can share posts about homework problems they're struggling with. Won first place at the PTC Code Against Covid Hackathon. Built using Express.js, EJS, and Bootstrap.
